name: Any Road Will Take You There
name_original: Any Road Will Take You There
description:
*This game is in progress.*

Hello there,

You are a tenured track professor of fiction and it's the season of applications; you're absolutely swamped with submissions.

While you're unafraid to scoff at anything that isn't "literary," you allowed one individual to submit an unusual tale. That email has finally arrived. You open it up. It's an HTML file. It reads:

"Any Road Will Take You There"

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

"Any Road Will Take You There" is a meta cosmic horror interactive fiction piece made in Twine that features:

- a dark yet humorous tone

- flavorful choices that allow the player to customize their tale

- annoyingly obtuse, pseudo-intellectual layers of meta-narrative

- brief but gratuitous mature scenes and themes

I'll be updating this game as I write and develop it. If you notice any typos or errors please let me know if you can.

Thanks for checking out my story!
